articles.content: High blood pressure, or hypertension, is a silent, asymptomatic killer that creeps up unknown to people. It is often discovered by accident during a routine medical check-up. The first signs may be d… [+3813 chars]

articles.title: Sitting around during Covid-19 has pushed up global diabetes prevalence by 16% - Scroll.in

articles.content:
